title: IBM Master Swing Short Level
content: International Business Machines Corp   NYSE IBM  continues to rally higher today  The stock is trading at  204 81   1 24   0 61    On Monday  IBM made a low at  196 80  This big move higher may continue into early next week but will soon yield a great shorting opportunity  The short level on IBM is  207 40  This is a key gap fill point and major resistance on the chart  The next leg down should begin once this price point is achieved

title: Morning Report  April 18  2012
content: Market sentiment improved dramatically overnight as Spain successfully conducted a debt auction and the International Monetary Fund raised its global growth forecasts  Spain successfully sold EUR 3 18 billion of bills against a target of EUR 3 billion  The average 12 month yield for the sale was 2 62   which is still significantly higher than an average yield of 1 42  for an auction held in late March The International Monetary Fund  for the first time since January 2011 raised its global growth forecast to 3 5  this year from a January projection of 3 3   It also raised its forecast for growth in the US to 2 4  for 2013  While recognising that the eurozone still faces a recession with the potential risk of further defaults  the IMF noted that the region had stabilised since last year  The EUR opens the Asia morning slightly higher at 1 3120 after trading in an 80 point range yesterday Further aiding investor appetite was the release of the stronger than expected German ZEW index  which looks to predict economic developments 6 months in advance  The index rose to its highest level since 2010 despite a majority of economists predicting a fall  However  it wasn t all good news as investors chose to ignore declines in US housing starts and factory production Industrial production in the US came in at 0  against expectations of 0 4  and housing starts rose by less than expected at 650K  Group of 20 finance ministers and central bank governors will meet in Washington later this week  The Australian dollar has gained more than a a cent from its lows yesterday to open this morning just below 1 0400 Global equity markets gained on a significant flow of good news  The S P 500 recorded it biggest rally this month to close 1 55  higher at 1 391  Apple surged almost 5  after recording its longest losing streak since October and financial shares gained almost 2  as Spain successfully completed its latest debt auction  The index had slumped more than 3 5  though yesterday from a four year high recorded on April 2  European shares powered higher with most indices gaining more than 2   Spain s IBEX rose 2 28   Asian equities recorded marginal loses Commodity prices gained as investor sentiment improved with the CRB gaining 1 28 points to 302 04  WTI continued to gain from the previous days release of strong US retail sales growth figures  rising 1 3  to  104 25  Precious metals remain subdued despite strong gains on the equity markets with gold gaining only 0 1  to  1 651 while silver is higher by 1  at  31 70  Soft commodities are broadly higher with cocoa and cotton recording the biggest gains  Copper is higher by 0 4  Gold again opens the Asian morning flat at  1650 after a false break under the support of  1641 triggered by a brief fall in euro saw the price rebound sharply  The trading range of  1634  1657 is nonetheless modest with investors focused on equity markets overnight  whose stellar performance once again overshadowed the traditional safe haven gold as names such as IBM  Goldman Sachs and Coca Cola all reported higher than expected profit A US economic recovery that looks more and more likely to be self sustainable as about 75  of S P 500 companies that had reported earnings beat estimates is likely to further put pressure on the yellow metal  The successful auction of Spanish bonds and a more than 3 years high of German investors confidence survey released last night also eased market fear The good earnings results from US companies have had us keep in mind a diminishing probability of any further monetary stimulus from policy makers  Gold could therefore fall in the long term  However in the short and medium term we remain neutral towards gold before we see any confirmation from future price moves Compass DirectionShort Term Medium TermNEUTRAL NEUTRALAUD USD fell in the expected Asia pattern despite upbeat New Vehicle Sales and the same old chin wagging from the RBA minutes  The price steadily declined to retest the support just ahead of 1 0300  Late in the Asia afternoon  once profit taking and the catching out of bears started the bounce  found renewed momentum as better than expected IMF growth forecasts and German confidence provided the impetus for a move higher The move above 1 0375 signalled a move higher to yesterday s noted second resistance level at 1 0415 as the Bank of Canada warned of a possible rate hike as inflation takes hold  After spending some time around the 1 0415 highs  the AUD has fallen back to 1 0390 with early Asia sellers being noted  MI Leading Index is the only data of note for the local currency and with its medium impact status we can t see much action from it We will be watching for leads from the equity markets and the euro  The pattern of Asia weakness looks set to continue but 1 0300 could be a little too far for today during the Asia trading session  Compass DirectionShort Term Medium TermBEARISH BEARISH

title: IBM Stock  2 5  Fall in After hours Trading Session
content: IBM reported higher than expected Q1 earnings but shares dropped 2 5 percent in after hours trading  During regular hours IBM stock gained 2 3  closing at  207 45  In the first 20 minutes of the after hours trading session IBM shares fell sharply to the day s open  and it will be interesting to monitor the technology stock on Wednesday  In the meantime  stock traders looking at the daily chart may find quite a few reasons to short IBM stock  like the doji candlestick on all time high  followed by the gap down  The 20 day moving average has also been penetrated the past few days  Yet  IBM stock has proven to be a great investment since 2009 when the uptrend began and IBM stock price was below  100 After hours trading session often presents big moves fueled by low volume though  Some traders disregard any after hours trading action  while others do take it into account when deciding on the next day s trading decisions  As stock news happens to become available outside regular trading hours occasionally  stock prices react to the news setting the general behavior before next day s open  In IBM s case after hours trading chart is the opposite of the intraday stock chart  with buyers giving up their power to sellers It would be worthwhile to watch Wednesday s IBM stock trading action and find out for yourself if after hours trading graphs can help your trading

title: 04 17 12   Bounce
content: Finally   it was really looking like things could go either way yesterday  Of course  that s always the case  but you know what I mean  I estimate SPY resistance cleared up through  139 30 or so  plus or minus  Internals look very supportive for a PM session continuation  although the QQQ is in rarified 2  gains territory already Strong Support We had one of the biggest gains of the year and 1370 on the S P provided strong support  but volume was lighter today than yesterday  Apple rebounded 5  after a soft opening and the market trended up all day  Both Intel and IBM are trading down after beating expectations slightly  IBM was soft on the top line but guided up their full year forecast  Expectations are high after a 30  run and the 2  jump today in the NASDAQ  We are only down a few points after hours and the bulls may consolidate side ways or slightly lower if oversea markets trade positively tonight

title: Stock Prices Rebound
content: Stock prices on major indexes rebounded yesterday on easing worries in Europe   Major US stock indexes rallied yesterday  back into significant resistance as this trading range continues    The Dow Jones Industrial Average  NYSEARCA DIA  climbed 194 points or 1 5   while the S P 500  NYSEARCA SPY  added 1 55     In the small cap sector  the Russell 2000  NYSEARCA IWM  jumped 1 6  while the widely watched Nasdaq representing the tech sector  NYSEARCA QQQ  advanced 2     The rally was largely driven by news from Europe where Spain conducted a successful bond auction and positive comments about global growth expectations from the International Monetary Fund    IBM and Intel  INTC  were hit hard after reporting earnings while Yahoo   YHOO  pleased its investors and rose sharply in the after hour session    Bonds remained subdued as worries about Europe lingered    Economic reports came in on the negative side as housing starts declined and industrial production and capacity utilization were flat    Today has no economic reports while earnings will continue to come full force    Bottom line  Yesterday was a low volume rally which has been the case lately  Distribution days  or selling  have been on higher volume while buying days are on lower volume which is typically a red flag for higher prices ahead  and many technical indicators tracking momentum and breadth continue to come up negative so the sustainability of the upward trend remains doubtful

title: U S  Stocks Slide As Tech Earnings Fail To Inspire
content: After Hours  Closing Update  U S  Stocks Slide as Tech Earnings Fail to Inspire4 12 PM  Apr 18  2012    U S  stocks slipped on Wednesday as investors failed to gain enough inspiration from the latest corporate earnings  With no major economic data on today s calendar  earnings garnered all the attention  Late Tuesday  Intel  INTC  projected second quarter gross margins below some estimates  and IBM s  IBM  quarterly profit topped expectations  but the company s revenue targets fell short Today s economic calendar was light  The Mortgage Bankers Association said its seasonally adjusted index of mortgage application activity  which includes both refinancing and home purchase demand  rose 6 9  during the week ended April 13  The trade groups index of refinancing applications surged 13 5  but a gauge of loan requests for home purchases dropped 11 2     the second week in a row purchases have declined On Thursday  investors will turn their attention to weekly jobless claims data and Spain s debt auction  Spain will auction of 10 year notes on Friday  and the U S  will report weekly jobless claims at 8 30 am Eastern In company news  U S  listed shares of YPF SA  YPF  resumed trading and plunged to a 52 week low  Earlier in the week  the Argentine government moved to take control of the oil and gas producer  Chesapeake Energy  CHK  shares slid to a 52 week low following a report by Reuters that Aubrey McClendon  the company s chief executive  has borrowed as much as  1 1 billion over the past three years against his own interest in the company s oil and natural gas wells  Arena Pharmaceuticals  ARNA  shares tumbled after TheStreet com issued a report that claims the company s own data implied its weight loss drug won t gain approval Crude oil fell today after the weekly government report showed inventories rose more than expected during the week ended April 13  although the same report found a large decrease for gasoline supplies  The May NYMEX closed down  1 45 at  102 75 a barrel  just off its session low  after the Energy Information Agency said crude inventories rose 3 9 million barrel last week  Experts polled by Platts had been expecting a 400 000 barrel rise  Gasoline supplies dropped 3 7 million barrels  Gold is also lower today  gold futures ended down  11 50  or 0 7   to settle at  1 639 60 an ounce on the Comex division of the New York Mercantile Exchange  its lowest settlement since April 5 Here s where the market stood at end of day Dow Jones Industrial Average down 82 79   0 63   to 13 032 75S P 500 down 5 64   0 41   to 1 385 14NASDAQ Composite down 11 37   0 37   to 3 031 45GLOBAL SENTIMENTNikkei 225 up 2 14 Hang Seng Index up 1 06 China Shanghai Composite up 1 96 FTSE 100 down 0 36 UPSIDE MOVERS    CHSI
